title: You Woke Up in the Land of Silly, it's Full of 23 Fuzzy Feline Memes for This Fursday
description: Good meowrning, sunshine. Are you an early bird who was already awake? Or are you a cat pawrent who woke up with a meowing tuna breath mouth on your face demanding its breakfast? Well, if you're a cat pawrent that's probably what happened. But what can your cat do? Their bowl is only half full - which is a crime, as you know. It's exactly like as if their food bowl is empty. Completely the same. So, are you going to just sit there in your bed? Get up, and give your supreme feline leader their breakfast.Now that you're up, you're ready to silly-up your day, in a true feline fashion. We gathered these silly cat memes below to help you silly-up like a cat during the morning, so your entire day will be as silly as a cat. Because when you're silly as a cat - your day is instantly better. Whether you're a cat pawrent and have a smol silly floofy feline at home, or you're not - these silly cat memes are here for every hooman this Fursday.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: You Woke Up in the Land of Silly, it's Full of 23 Fuzzy Feline Memes for This Fursday - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Good meowrning, sunshine. Are you an early bird who was already awake? Or are you a cat pawrent who woke up with a meowing tuna breath mouth on your face demanding its breakfast? Well, if you're a cat pawrent that's probably what happened. But what can your cat do? Their bowl is only half full - which is a crime, as you know. It's exactly like as if their food bowl is empty. Completely the same. So, are you going to just sit there in your bed? Get up, and give your supreme feline leader their breakfast.

Now that you're up, you're ready to silly-up your day, in a true feline fashion. We gathered these silly cat memes below to help you silly-up like a cat during the morning, so your entire day will be as silly as a cat. Because when you're silly as a cat - your day is instantly better. Whether you're a cat pawrent and have a smol silly floofy feline at home, or you're not - these silly cat memes are here for every hooman this Fursday.
